channel.title: Plugins on CFOps
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on CFOps

item.title: Downloads
item.description:
Setup

Install following steps on plugin documentation page

Validate installed correctly by executing 

./cfops list-tiles
Should output mysql-tile as one of tiles

MySql Plugin Downloads

Below are the available downloads for the latest version of mysql plugin for cfops. Please download the proper package for your operating system. You can also download older versions of cfops from the GitHub releases page.
